entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 March 2023
